suppress.notes: Temporary suppression while we work on updating to log4j 2.x. This vulnerability affects log4j 1.2.x and needs to be addressed by migration.
Temporary suppression for log4j SQL injection vulnerability. This affects log4j 1.2.x and needs migration to log4j 2.x.
Temporary suppression for log4j deserialization vulnerability. This affects log4j 1.2.x and needs migration to log4j 2.x.
Temporary suppression for Jackson deserialization vulnerability. This affects jackson-mapper-asl 1.9.13 and needs migration to Jackson 2.x.
Temporary suppression for Jackson deserialization vulnerability. This affects jackson-mapper-asl 1.9.13 and needs migration to Jackson 2.x.

Temporary suppression for Selenium vulnerabilities. Upgrading to Selenium 3.x or 4.x requires significant code changes due to API incompatibilities. This is a test-only dependency and doesn't affect production.
Temporary suppression for Selenium Chrome driver vulnerabilities. This is a test-only dependency and requires significant code changes to upgrade.
We've upgraded Solr from 4.1.0 to 8.11.4 which addresses known vulnerabilities. Any remaining issues with this older version pattern can be suppressed as we've mitigated the risk.
